member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes (such as a rebuilding layout pass) call System.Windows.Controls.Control.ApplyTemplate(). member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadConversationView.CreateMessage
member.summary: A callback that is used to create a custom conversation view message based on the text that is entered into the conversation view text box.
member.remarks: This property has to be used when custom message objects are used because RadConversationView does not know how to create these custom messages. When this property is null, the default implementation assumes that RadConversationView is bound to a data source of objects.

member.summary: Groups are rendered as normal items are.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GroupHeaderWrapMode.Stretch
member.summary: Groups are stretched to take a single wrap line in the layout.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GroupCheckMode
member.summary: Provides the possible behavior options for data groups when the check-mode is activated in .

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GroupCheckMode.Standard
member.summary: Data groups can be independently checked or unchecked without affecting their children.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GroupCheckMode.Automatic
member.summary: When a data group is checked or unchecked all its children are also checked or unchecked.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GroupCheckMode.None
member.summary: Data groups do not participate in the check mode.
